snippet: An 11-year-old boy who died awaiting a heart transplant was the inspiration for a car show at the University of Michigan C. S. Mott Children’s Hospital.
abstract: Staff at University of Michigan C S Mott Children's Hospital in Ann Arbor were inspired by young patient Caden Bowles, who died at age 11 while awaiting heart transplant, to hold Caden's Car Show in his honor; private show, intended to give young patients and their families a diversion from their medical ordeals, features nearly 60 cars, including classics, new models and novelties with child appeal.
lead_paragraph: An 11-year-old boy who died awaiting a heart transplant was the inspiration for a car show at the University of Michigan C. S. Mott Children’s Hospital.

headline.main: A Car Show for Caden, Who Would Have Loved It
headline.print_headline: A Car Show for Caden, Who Would Have Loved It
